name: Aloxicoll® L
description: ALOXICOLL® type L is a standard antiperspirant active. Its efficacy is due to the precipitation of basic Aluminum Chlorohydrate polymer complexes in the upper part of the sweat glands. These polymers can be measured by HPLC. A typical HPLC trace for ALOXICOLL® L can be seen below, indicating the characteristic polymer distribution from and 1 to band 4.
